) Purpose and Program Goals: This IRM section provides guidance for Integrity Veriﬁcation Operations (RIVO) employees when screening Scope and Master File (BMF) returns for possible identity theft and Entity Fabrication. BMF returns are scored through the Dependent Database (DDb) or the Return Review Program (RRP) system. These scoring processes potential fraud criteria including made up Employer Identiﬁcation (EINs) that do not exist or EINs that are tied to an existing legitimate (
) Audience: The procedures in this IRM apply to RIVO employees. (
) Policy Owner: Return Integrity Veriﬁcation Program Management (RIVPM) the policy owner of this program. (
) Program Owner: RIVPM is the program office responsible for oversight this program. (

) RIVO strengthens the integrity of the tax system by: • Protecting the public interest by improving IRS’s ability to detect prevent improper refunds • Serving the public interest by taking actions fairly and appropriately identify, evaluate and prevent the issuance of improper refunds • Helping taxpayers understand the refundable tax credits for which are eligible (

) Business Master File Identity Check (BMFIC) is a web application used to track and monitor cases that have been marked fraudulent, used to track letters, responses, calls, research, and determinations of case legitimacy. BMFIC is a combination of Entity Fabrication (EF) and Business Master (BMF) Identity Theft (IDT) programs. EF tracks potential fraud on fake nesses created to claim false refunds. BMF IDT tracks fraud on EINs that tied to an existing legitimate business. BMFIC is utilized to ensure a made of all pertinent actions taken on accounts. (

) The BMFIC infrastructure includes: • Dashboard – Snapshot of inventory (All Cases, My Cases) and Status Summary. • Cases – View, add, edit cases and record actions taken on cases. • Import – Based on user permissions, import initial case inventory, update case actions in bulk. • Reports - Based on user permissions, view BMFIC reports correspondence information, time tracking, and undeliverable • Settings - Based on user permissions, manage drop down menu options. • Case Search – Search for cases using EIN, Business Name, Locator Number (DLN), or Employee SEID.
